lyrics: Rainy day　ひとりぼっち夢見てる　Happy christmasみんなが　待っているすてきな　Happy christmas街を　歩けば流れている　Jingle bellBoy friend　いないけれど祈ってるの　夢の Steady今はまだ　雨の Novemberだけどきっと　恋の Eve にはFalling snow and youそれは　White christmasSanta Claus は　ア・ナ・タ　よ！Rainy tree　窓のむこう雨にけむる　Waiting christmas今夜も　眠る前にまだ見ぬ彼(ひと)を　Waiting christmas今はまだ　雨の Novemberだけどきっと　恋の Eve にはFalling snow and youそれは　White christmasSanta Claus は　ア・ナ・タ　よ！
translated_lyrics: ♫ Rainy day ♫ ♫ I'm dreaming ♫ ♫ Happy Happy ♫ ♫ I'm walking ♫ ♫ I'm walking ♫ ♫ Steady, Steady, ♫ ♫ Steady, it's still raining. ♫ ♫ Falling snow and you. ♫ ♫ Falling snow and you. ♫ ♫ White christmaso, ♫ Claus is a Na Ta!♫ Rainy tree windows ♫ ♫ Waiting for the windows ♫ ♫ Waiting for the windows ♫ ♫ Waiting for the night ♫ ♫ Waiting for the night ♫ ♫ Waiting on the rain ♫ ♫ Falling snow, ♫ ♫ Falling snow and you ♫ ♫ and it's the White christmasSanta Claus' ♫ ♫ is a Na-ta-la! ♫
